page.title: 05CHANGES IN VILLAGES
page.content: People we interviewed were concerned about some changes in village life. Lack of public transport is a concern to some, especially to the elderly who cannot drive. They feel dependent on friends and relatives. Another cause for concern is the increase in the number of holiday cottages and the shortage of houses for young, local people who cannot afford to buy property which is much sought after in this area. There are also many people retiring to live in this area and the population of the villages is changing with fewer young families than in previous generations. Many village schools have closed since the 1950's. 4 schools used to serve this area; there is now only one. There is a fear that in the next few years the Post Offices and the remaining school may close.
